page.title: 11LANGUAGE
page.content: We live in a part of Wales where the language spoken is mainly Welsh. The school is a bilingual one and every child whether Welsh or English leaves the school at eleven able to speak both languages.All the shopkeepers speak Welsh and this helps to preserve the language in the area. Over the past 10-15 years many English families have moved inti the area either to work at the University at Aberystwyth or at the Welsh Plant Breeding Station at Bow Street, others have bought smallholdingsand have turned to farming.Thus there has been a decline in the number of Welsh speakers in the area. Welsh Learner classes for adults have been established and are very popular and this helps to keep and preserve the Welshness of Talybont the and the surrounding area.
